news_header: Israel mourns four hostages returned dead by Hamas, triggering national grief and calls for dignified treatment of hostages.
news_original_title: Israel's 'hearts lie in tatters' as Hamas hands over first dead hostages
news_text: Israel's president expressed national grief as Hamas returned the bodies of four hostages, including a mother and her two children. The incident has sparked widespread mourning and calls for a dignified treatment of hostages. The return of the bodies marks the first time Hamas has returned deceased captives since the ceasefire began. Ongoing negotiations for the release of living hostages continue.
